```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
library(entreprises)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
get_company(siret = "38235772100028") %>% head()
```

## Companies nearby

```{r}
get_nearby(latitude = 48.8503, longitude = 2.30831) %>%
  dplyr::glimpse()
```

## Search companies

```{r}
search_company(string = "Paris Saint Germain") %>% 
  magrittr::extract2("etablissement") %>% 
  tibble::as_tibble() %>% 
  dplyr::glimpse()
```
